title: Mini-Ep 113: Toner and Gossip
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 113: Toner and Gossip
itunes:subtitle: Listeners ask Kate and Doree for their advice about how to interact with pessimistic people, when to re-support a boycotted brand after seeing active and lasting change, and what they think about gossiping. Plus: a discussion about toner, an often-igno...
description:
Listeners ask Kate and Doree for their advice about how to interact with pessimistic people, when to re-support a boycotted brand after seeing active and lasting change, and what they think about gossiping. Plus: a discussion about toner, an often-ignored skincare step.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


  • INKEYLIST - Visit theinkeylist.com to get started on your own skincare journey.
  • ROMCOMPODS - Enjoy the feature length romcom podcast you didn’t know you needed until right now. Listen to Honeymoon For One on Spotify, apple or wherever you get your podcasts.
  • RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35
  • ATHENA CLUB - Athena Club is a better self-care routine made simple. Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code FOREVER35 for 15% off today! 
  • FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.
  • TALKSPACE - Get your first week free of Talkspace when you visit talkspace.com use promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
